subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tim Donaghy, who graduated from Cardinal O’Hara, a large Catholic high school in Springfield, Pa., in 1985, is being investigated for betting on N.B.A. games.
snippet: Tim Donaghy, who graduated from Cardinal O’Hara, a large Catholic high school in Springfield, Pa., in 1985, is being investigated for betting on N.B.A. games.
